忠臣蔵: (chuushingura) - performance or narrative based on the story of the Forty-seven Ronin (esp. o Kanadehon Chushingura, uma épica peça de marionetes apresentada pela primeira vez em 1748)
忠言耳に逆らう: (ちゅうげんみみにさからう) - Good advice is harsh to the ear
忠言逆耳: (ちゅうげんぎゃくじ) - (yoji) good advice is harsh to the ears; honest advice is often unpleasant to the ears
忠誠を尽くす: (ちゅうせいをつくす) - to be loyal to; to serve; to offer allegiance
忠誠を誓う: (ちゅうせいをちかう) - to pledge allegiance; to swear an oath of allegiance; to take an oath of allegiance
忠霊塔: (ちゅうれいとう) - monument to the faithful who died in battle
忠魂: (ちゅうこん) - loyalty; the loyal dead
忠魂碑: (ちゅうこんひ) - monument to the faithful who died in battle
快く: (こころよく) - comfortably; cheerfully; willingly; gladly
快を貪る: (かいをむさぼる) - to enjoy oneself to the full
快刀乱麻: (かいとうらんま) - (yoji) solving a problem swiftly and skillfully
快刀乱麻を断つ: (かいとうらんまをたつ) - to cut the Gordian knot
快勝: (かいしょう) - sweeping victory; easy victory
快哉を叫ぶ: (かいさいをさけぶ) - to shout with exultation; to shout for joy
快復: (かいふく) - (回復, 恢復 only) restoration/rehabilitation/recovery/return/replevin/improvement; (esp. 快復) recovery (from an illness)/recuperation/convalescence
快心: (かいしん) - good feeling; comfortable feeling
快快的: (カイカイデー) - hurriedly (chi: kuài kuài de); rapidly; swiftly
快挙: (かいきょ) - brilliant achievement; spectacular feat; splendid accomplishment; remarkable deed
快方に向かう: (かいほうにむかう) - to improve; to get better; to convalesce
快方に赴く: (かいほうにおもむく) - to improve; to get better; to convalesce
快晴: (かいせい) - clear weather; cloudless weather; good weather
快楽主義者: (かいらくしゅぎしゃ) - hedonist; epicurean
快楽原則: (かいらくげんそく) - pleasure principle (psychology)
快気祝: (かいきいわい) - celebrating recovery from illness
快気祝い: (かいきいわい) - celebrating recovery from illness
快気祝いをする: (かいきいわいをする) - to celebrate one's recovery from illness
快気祝をする: (かいきいわいをする) - to celebrate one's recovery from illness
快演: (かいえん) - superb performance; good performance
快然: (かいぜん) - happy/elated/good mood/pleasant feelings; cured (of an illness)/recovered (from an illness)
快腕: (かいわん) - remarkable ability; amazing ability
快足: (かいそく) - quick of foot; fast; nimble-footed
快速: (かいそく) - high speed; celerity; mobility; express (train that bypasses many stations)
快速列車: (かいそくれっしゃ) - express train
快速電車: (かいそくでんしゃ) - high-speed train
快進撃: (かいしんげき) - steady advance; carrying all before one
快霽: (かいせい) - clear weather; cloudless weather; good weather
快音: (かいおん) - pleasant sound; crack (of a baseball bat); roar (of a motor)
快食快便: (かいしょくかいべん) - (yoji) good appetite and good bowel movements; enjoying one's food and having regular stools
快食快眠: (かいしょくかいみん) - (yoji) good appetite and pleasant sleep; enjoying one's food and sleeping well
忰せる: (かせる) - to dry up/to scab/to slough; to be poisoned (with lacquer); to waste away
念: (nen) - pensamento, senso, ideia, pensamento, sentimento; desejo, preocupação; atenção, cuidado
念々: (ねんねん) - continually thinking about something
念い: (おもい) - thought; imagination/mind/heart; desire/wish/hope/expectation; (e.g. Ａ思いのＢ for 'B who loves A') love/affection; feelings/emotion/sentiment/experience
念う: (おもう) - (想う has connotations of heart-felt) to think/to consider/to believe; to think (of doing)/to plan (to do); to judge/to assess/to regard; to imagine/to suppose/to dream; to expect/to look forward to; to feel/to desire/to want; to recall/to remember
念じる: (ねんじる) - to have in mind; to be anxious about; to pray silently
念ずる: (ねんずる) - to pray silently; to have in mind; to be anxious about
念には念を入れよ: (ねんにはねんをいれよ) - Make assurance double sure
念のため: (ねんのため) - (just) making sure; just to be sure; just in case; for caution's sake
念の為: (ねんのため) - (just) making sure; just to be sure; just in case; for caution's sake
念を入れる: (ねんをいれる) - to pay attention to
念を押す: (ねんをおす) - to make sure of; to call attention to; to emphasize; to emphasise
念五日: (ねんごにち) - 25th of the month; 25 days
念人: (ねんじん) - assistant in a duel (e.g. a cockfight, poetry contest, etc.) (Heian period); older male in an homosexual relationship
念仏: (ねんぶつ) - Buddhist prayer; prayer to Amitabha
